name: Gateway Project: Bora Bora
alt: Gateway Bora Bora Project Home page
description: The first project ever created by yours-truly in September 2020. It consists of HTML and CSS. A bit of context, this project focused on a location I wanted to visit. The website includes a home page, activities and accommodations page, and a contact us page. This was one of the hardest projects as I did not previously have much experience with websites so I am proud of the functionality and it looks pretty nice for my first website. This web page is CSS and HTML validated by W3C Markup Validation Services.

name: Reservation App: El Amingo Pub & Grill
description: A reservation app created with HTML and CSS. The purpose was to create a simple form that looks clean and user-friendly while practicing more CSS. Created in early October 2020.

name: CLT Health Help
description: During the Code for Justice Hackathon, our team created a website designed to help the current health crisis in the Charlotte area. We included informational statistics about the current issue we face in our healthcare system, advocating resources, and local healthcare/pharmaceutical resources in the area. This project was created with basic HTML and CSS in our fifth week in the Road to Hire program.

name: Guessing Game: Voice Recognition API
alt: Voice Recognition API Gessing game app
description: Guess your number 1 - 100 into the mic. This app is created with HTML, CSS, and JS to create an interactive guessing game. Dom manipulation and external API used. Responsive design.

name: Guessing Game: Manual Input
alt: Guessing game manual input home page
description: Retro guessing game with manual input using HTML, CSS, and JS (DOM manipulation). Guess a number between 1 - 20. Once you guess the right number the screen will turn green. Hooray. Make more than 20 guesses and it's game over, the screen will turn red.

name: Animated Navigation Bar
description: Using HTML, CSS, and JS to create a animated hamburger style navigation bar.

name: To Do App: React
description: A Simple To-Do App. Includes ReactJS and CSS. One of the first projects made when learning react. Type in your list item and press enter. This time will appear below in bullet point format.

name: To Do App: mySQL & Node
alt: todo app built with node and mySQL
description: Interactive to do app build with mySQL, Node, and Express API. You can add, mark as complete, and then delete these tasks with a click. Enjoy!

name: Tic-tac-toe Game
description: Play this interactive tic tac toe game that's created with React and CSS. Full-screen only. Once one of the players wins, the screen background will turn to confetti but it's a draw it'll turn gray and give you an option to play again.

name: Pet Ace: A Pet Store
alt: Pet ace home page, a pet store
description: Pet Ace is an eCommerce website created with ReactJS and CSS. Packages included are React Router DOM, React Slideshow Images, and Font Awesome Icons. This site is responsive for mobile and tablet. Users can use a filter to sort through products. Repository version 1 can be found as eCommerce-Project-R2H. Current repository can be found as Pet-Ace-Ecommerce.

name: Skylark Social: React Friends App
description: This basic social platform is created with ReactJS, SASS, Node, and MySQL. Interactive. To Login use username: 'Test', password: 'pass'. View your list of friends and check out the social button to see different users with a quick blurb about their favorite quote. Primarily used to practice MySQL on a website.

name: Portfolio
description: This portfolio was created with React and CSS. Packages include React Router Dom, React Icons, and Formspree API.  Feel free to check out the github repository.
